page.syntax: $u.a.find(arr as array, value as any [, findAll as boolean [, exactMatch as boolean]])
page.description: Find a value in an array.

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value to search for in the array.

argument.name: findAll
argument.description: (optional) A true/false value. If true, true, the function will search the entire array, and return an array of matching indexes. Otherwise it will return the index of the first match found.

argument.name: exactMatch
argument.description: (optional) A true/false value. Specifies whether you would like to find exact matches, or any instances that contain the value passed in.
